descriptionHtml:
Just outside the abandoned south gate of riften, there appears to be a hidden chest with a shiv designed for the expert.

Essentially this mod is for the professional assassin. This shiv does 1 damage, and so is useless for combat. However when stealthed, the shiv is light and easy to place, causing a guranteed kill. (When in the RIGHT hand, LEFT is untested)

I personally use this shiv for my assassin\'s. I use ONLY this shiv, and if my character dies, I stop playing it.
Resulting in a very rewarding experience in stealth combat.
If your stood directly behind any race, you could easily thrust a shiv into any place that would instantly kill them. Thats what this shiv does.

Anyways I hope you like it! I recommend using it with my \"Secret Entrances\" addon.

UPDATE: The way this shiv achieves a 1 hit kill is by using a script to grant a hidden perk whilst equipped. The moment its uneqquiped, you lose the perk. The perk grants a x1000 times sneak damage multiplier.

== RECOMMENDED == 
The dance of Death; a killmoves mod.
